attributes.review: I downloaded this app wanting to be politically WOKE. After three minutes of having it my phone started to crash and then this god awful picture of what looked like a badly spray tanned baby with lip injections but somehow also looks 90. It was horrifying! I was not ready for this kind of scare. But I kept going. My phone started to play some sort of Alabama banjo song and then a photo of what looked like a baby carrot between two giant cheese balls was on my screen. I threw my phone, broke it and now want Donald Turnip to buy me a new one.

attributes.review: this app is honestly the worst app i have ever downloaded it has viruses and a lot of lag also caused my phone to malfunction a lot so this is why i think that this app should be taken off the app store immediately! disgusting app broke my phone and when you first open the app theres a very unforgettable traumatising photo of a carrot with dead grass instead of green leafs i still cant erase the horrible imagine off my mind so please take it off immediately before the whole world becomes mentally unstable like me. thank you.

attributes.review:
I went on this app to see what all the hate was about.  As soon as I opened the app, My phone glitches like crazy.  Some Orange Cheeto man kept flashing on my phone like crazy.  My phone then started levitating by all the vibrations.  I quickly closed the app thinking I was safe.  A couple days later a man in a black suit saying that he worked for Trump, karate kicked me straight in the face.  I tried to get away, but he grabbed me by the collar and barked right in my face.  Donâ€™t download this app if you donâ€™t want to go to the hospital.  
    0/10 ğŸ˜¡

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping it would cure the virus around the US right now but boy was I WRONGGGG! This goblin appeared out of no where asking if I could give him some pennies. My mom told me not to talk to strangers, so I said NO, OBVIOUSLY, and wanted her to pick me up. This made my dog eat up my phone because the sounds and looks of this app disgusted him. But I was able to get my phone back when he burped it back out. Honestly, donâ€™t know why this app is still on here. Please get rid of it to avoid the Cookie Monster taking all of your cookies too! ğŸª

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because my grandparents are obsessed with trump and they were raving about this app, COME TO FIND OUT that this is literally trumpâ€™s personal porn site! i opened the app sitting next to my mom and the first thing that pops up is a NAKED PICTURE OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES!!! iâ€™m discussed. iâ€™m horrified. iâ€™m one of the many young minds in the united states AND THIS IS THE THANKS I GET!!! ARE YOU KIDDING ME!?!? i downloaded this app to see what my grandparents were talking about and my poor eyes have to see a disgusting picture of our cheeto puff president! i will be deleting this app immediately!
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIFIC

attributes.review: I was in shock when I saw that our fabulous president blessed us with an app under his graceful name, but when you open the app it requires you to enter your phone number. Please, DO NOT give it your phone number! When I did, I got text after text from hot middle aged women in my area asking for sex! I'm not gonna lie, it was a little tempting, so I texted one or two, but they just sent me the same text over and over. THEY DON'T EVEN COME OVER TO YOUR HOUSE LIKE THEY PROMISE!! Worst app ever, not what I expected, not what I wanted, didn't work out. 0/10.
attributes.title: REMOVE THIS FROM THE APP STORE NOW!!!
